column1: '''Royd Allan Reuel Tolkien''' (b. [[16 July]] [[1969]]) is a great-grandson of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]], the grandchild of Tolkiens second son, [[Michael Tolkien
column2: Michael]]. His birthname is Royd Baker, but appears to have changed to Royd Tolkien when became adult.{{fact}}

column1: Royd Tolkien played a [[Rangers of Ithilien
column2: Ranger]] in ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King]]''.<ref>{{webcite
